title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7024.8 - Religious articles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7024.8 - Religious articles

State Regulations

Consistent with the requirements of section
7024.1
(b) of this

Part, prisoners shall be entitled to wear and possess religious medals or other
religious articles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7024.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
